description: Microsoft is rolling out Windows 11 24H2 to testers in the Release Preview Channel, confirming that it is in the final stages of testing. [...]
title: Windows 11 24H2 now rolling out to Release Preview Insiders

description: Microsoft announced today that it will start deprecating VBScript in the second half of 2024 by making it an on-demand feature until it's completely removed. [...]
title: Microsoft to start killing off VBScript in second half of 2024

description: Security researchers are warning that China-linked state-backed hackers are increasingly relying on vast proxy networks of virtual private servers and compromised connected devices for cyberespionage operations. [...]
title: State hackers turn to massive ORB proxy networks to evade detection

description: The Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) will pay a $10 million penalty to settle charges brought by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) after failing to ensure its subsidiaries promptly reported an April 2021 VPN security breach. [...]
title: Intercontinental Exchange to pay $10M SEC penalty over VPN breach

description: LastPass announced it will start encrypting URLs stored in user vaults for enhanced privacy and protection against data breaches and unauthorized access. [...]
title: LastPass is now encrypting URLs in password vaults for better security

description: A previously unknown threat actor dubbed "Unfading Sea Haze" has been targeting military and government entities in the South China Sea region since 2018, remaining undetected all  this time. [...]
title: Chinese hackers hide on military and govt networks for 6 years
